func numberOfBoomerangs(points [][]int) (ans int) {
 for _, p := range points {
 cnt := make(map[int]int)
 for _, q := range points {
 dis := (p[0] - q[0]) * (p[0] - q[0]) + (p[1] - q[1]) * (p[1] - q[1])
 cnt[dis] ++
 }

 for _, i := range cnt {
 ans += i * (i - 1)
 }
 }

 return ans
}

func findIntegers(n int) (ans int) {

 for i := 2; i < k; i++ {
 dp[i] = dp[i-1] + dp[i-2]
 }

 k = 31
 pre := 0
 for k >= 0 {
 if n&(1<<k) != 0 {
 ans += dp[k]
 if pre == 1 {
 return ans
 }
 pre = 1
 } else {
 pre = 0
 }
 k -= 1
 }

 return ans + 1
}
